title: Android 10 issues
content:
I want to start this to light a fire underneath GOOGLE. What issue are you having since the Android 10 update?
I have a pixel 2 XL.
1. screen rotate. it would randomly rotate with screen rotate off.. turn it on nothing... hmmm the all of sudden no problem
2. CAMERA... black screen. crashes immediately.( i know a lot of you have this issue.
3. Battery. I mean WTF? i could go form 430 am to 9 pm on my battery. now ....noon. Im not even on my phone.

What issues are you having? let stick it to GOOGLE so they have to acknowledge us.
